Blessing Bonus:
Each time you send a Legendary
Hero, Mythic Hero, or blessed
Hero from the current season into
battle, you'll get a score bonus of
+1 when battle concludes.

You can use an Aether Resort Pass
to double your daily R&R Affinity!

With a pass, you'll receive double
R&R Affinity the next seven times
you get your daily R&R Affinity.

After using up your pass, you will be
able to acquire a new one in order to
keep receiving bonus R&R Affinity.

Fortress (O) Low-Tier Tuning:
While in low AR Tiers, the level of
your Fortress (O) will be raised
when you attack, like so:
Tiers 1–2: Level+4
Tier 3: Level+3
Tiers 4–5: Level+2
Tiers 6–12: Level+1

R&R Affinity earns Aether Stones!

Aether Resort:
A map where you can freely place
Heroes and structures—and watch
as they interact with each other.

R&R Affinity:
・ A resource used to expand the
features of your Aether Resort.
You will gain one Aether Stone for
every 10 R&R Affinity used.
・ Once per day, you can gain
R&R Affinity by visiting your
Aether Resort.

Aether Resort Pass:
With one of these, you will receive
twice as much R&R Affinity from
your first daily visit to your Aether
Resort for seven daily visits.

Special Events:
Once a week, you can gain R&R
Affinity by viewing any event.
(This resets when a new Aether
Raids season begins.)

Resort Events:
・Tap a structure or drag a Hero
onto a structure to start an event.
・ Any event started by a Hero
being dragged onto a structure is
guaranteed to include that Hero.

Change Heroes:
You can choose Heroes to invite
to your resort from your allies or
from your friends' allies.

Raising the Resort Limit:
You can use R&R Affinity to raise
the limit on the number of Heroes
you can invite to your resort.

Random:
If you set a slot to Random, a
random Hero will be invited to
your Aether Resort from among
your allies.
Custom-design your resort map!

Resort Map:
A resort-exclusive map where any
structures you have can be placed
however you want. (Resort maps
are not used for battle. Structure
placement from your Aether Raids
maps will not be reflected in your
resort map.)

Building Structures:
You can use R&R Affinity to
build structures. (Structures you
have built can also be placed on
defense maps in Aether Raids.)

R&R Amenities:
You can use R&R Affinity to build
amenities, which enrich events
within your resort. (You must have
the structure the amenity requires
placed in your resort.)

Place:
You can place structures you
have built on the map, even if one
or more structures with the same
name have already been placed.

Place Limit:
You can use R&R Affinity to
raise the place limit.

Change Terrain:
Changes the resort's terrain.
(Does not affect the terrain of
Aether Raids maps.)

Aether Keeps
Fight together as a pair!

Pair Up:
Legendary Heroes who have the
Pair Up ability can band together
in a pair with an ally.

When the Legendary Hero who is
the lead in a pair is deployed into
battle and their cohort is not, the
two will join the battle as a group.

Pair Up - Compatible Modes:
・ Main Story
・ Paralogues
・ Training Tower
・ Allegiance Battles

Pair Up Effects 1:
Allies who are deployed as a pair
will have boosts granted to their
stats. These boosts are based on
their partner's stats.

Note: Values are detailed on the
next help page.

Pair Up Bonuses:
Atk: (Partner's Atk - 25) / 10
Spd: (Partner's Spd - 10) / 10
Def: (Partner's Def - 10) / 10
Res: (Partner's Res - 10) / 10

Note: Maximum bonus of +4 to
each stat, rounded down.

Pair Up Effects 2: Switch
The lead and cohort allies in a
Pair Up unit can be swapped
by tapping the Switch button.

This button remains active even
after the unit has moved.

More Information:
If either of the allies in a Pair Up
unit have the Sing or Dance skill,
then Sing or Dance cannot be
used on that Pair Up unit.

More Information:
・ When deployed, the cohort
cannot grant or receive Legendary
Effects.
・ Only the lead receives EXP, SP,
and HM.
・ A cohort's Support Effects will
not activate.
Tap an ally, then tap Switch.

Seasonal Parties 1:
You will have the option to set
raiding parties to be used for
Astra and Light seasons. These
parties will be displayed during
those seasons.
Note: This option becomes
available after the Aether Raids
tutorial.

Seasonal Parties 2:
During seasonal party formation,
the Maximum Lift shown refers
to either the current season or
subsequent season, depending
on what party is viewed.
Note: Outside of a season, the
Maximum Lift for the season
after the next is not shown.

Switch to seasonal raiding party
formation?

・ The raiding party will switch
automatically when the season
switches to Light or Astra.

Switch to all-season raiding party
formation?

・ The suggested parties will be
the same season to season.
Note: The raiding parties formed
for Light season will be used as
the shared raiding parties.

Partner

When the Legendary Hero who is
the lead in a pair is deployed into
battle and their cohort is not, the
two will join the battle as a group.

Support Effect Limitations:
Support effects are not granted in
defensive battles in the Arena or
defensive battles in Aether Raids.

Summoner Support Limitations:
Summoner support effects are not
granted in defensive battles in the
Arena or defensive battles in
Aether Raids.
